授業目的:
The goal for this class is to develop your speaking skills. Most of the activities you do will help you with vocabulary and so you can have short discussions in small groups. The topic themes for the spring semester are listed below.
1. Introduction / 2. School Life vs. University Life / 3. Beliefs / 4. Opinions
